name: UF-Ohh
description:
UF-Ohh is a small puzzle game loosely based on the 90’s computer game “Lawyers“. The idea of the game fit too well with the theme not participate. I apologize in advance for the art - I am a programmer first and an artist like eighth…

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • QEZC for diagonal movement
  • Space to “pass” a turn
  • F to teleport (Requires 2 cows; consumes 1 cow.)

The game can be reliably completed in under 15 seconds. Good Luck, have fun, and don’t die!

Full source download below.
